content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Publishing a game on Epic Games Store involves game developers from one side and Epic Gamesâ€™ teams (Service Delivery, Legal, Finance, Marketing, etc.) from the other.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM team examined each part of the process and created the Future State Map that will allow game developers (large and small) to publish games end-to-end with minimal or no involvement from Epic Games.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":26825,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f9756513-cfdf-4292-ae41-b370697691d5/17.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f9756513-cfdf-4292-ae41-b370697691d5/17.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"17.JPG\",\"name\":\"17.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f9756513-cfdf-4292-ae41-b370697691d5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":524,\"height\":498},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
